title: Russia bombs theatre where civilians sheltering - official
content: Russian forces have bombed a theatre in Mariupol where hundreds were sheltering, the deputy mayor tells the BBC.

title: Russia bombs theatre where civilians sheltering - official
content: Russian forces have bombed a theatre in Mariupol where hundreds were sheltering, the deputy mayor tells the BBC.

title: Nazanin on her way home to 'new life' in UK
content: British-Iranian nationals Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe and Anoosheh Ashoori are being flown back to their families after being released by Iran.

title: Zelensky invokes 9/11 in plea to US Congress
content: Ukraine's leader invoked the horror of the 2001 attacks on the US as he pleaded for more military aid.

title: Japan hit by strong quake prompting tsunami alert
content: The quake in the country's north-east rattled Tokyo and briefly cut power to millions of homes

title: Russia's state TV hit by stream of resignations
content: Marina Ovsyannikova's protest highlighted a growing number of journalists leaving their jobs at Kremlin-run TV channels.

title: Surrogate babies wait for parents in Kyiv bomb shelter
content: At least 21 infants born through surrogacy are left in limbo because of the war in Ukraine.

title: The troubling tale of a vanished basketball star
content: Brittney Griner, widely considered the best female player of all time, has been detained in Russia.
